result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Solomon Kamar Tipton

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Solomon Kamar Tipton.  Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton in court, in custody.  Attorney Erin Michelle Karshen in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: STW 
Case set for Motion Hearing.  Motion Hearing proceeded. Arguments placed on the record. Court GRANTED State's motion for joinder. Defense request matter placed on the trial calendar. Case adjourned, Branch 38.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 3, 2023 at 08:15 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Scott Franklin Anderson in court for Solomon Kamar Tipton. Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton not in court, in custody.   Attorney Alicia Kort on behalf of Erin Michelle Karshen in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: STW 
Case set for Motion Hearing. Defendant was not produced for todays hearing. State has not filed a joinder motion. Court ordered case adjourned, Branch 38.
Motion hearing scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Scott David Anderson in court, defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton not in court, in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: STW
BRANCH 38 FOR BRANCH 6. Case set for Status Conference. State request matter be joinded with 21CF4558. Defense objects to joinder and request a hearing. This case will stay on Branch 38 calendar. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Motion hearing scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton in court with Attorney Scott F Anderson; both appear by video.  Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton in custody.  Edward OBrien appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective P. Miner.   State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case remains calendared for 8/11/2022 at 8:30am and is adjourned to Branch 15.

Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton in court with attorney Scott F Anderson.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for State v. Lee Hearing.  Defense counsel was recently appointed.  Court will schedule case back in preliminary hearing court.  Case adjourned, Br. 15.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton not in court, defendant in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V-LEE hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for preliminary hearing. States witness is present. OPD needs additional time to appoint an attorney. Court adjourns case for an attorney to be appointed. Court finds good CAUSE to adjourn preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with JDW

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.   If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton in court with attorney Matt W Kline.  Defendant Solomon Kamar Tipton in custody.  Chad Wozniak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Solomon Kamar Tipton appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant has lower number case(s) pending.  Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Watts, Branch 15.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
